translations: 国家地位；州的状态或地位

sentences.sentence: West Virginia was granted statehood in 1863.
sentences.translation: 西弗吉尼亚于1863年获准成为一个州。

sentences.sentence: Within six years, Utah had won statehood.
Not all of the world's nations have their own statehood.
sentences.translation: 并非世界上所有民族都拥有自己的国家地位。
